title: CryptorClub
author: CryptorClub
created_time: May 21, 2023, 12:07:06 AMLast edit: May 21, 2023, 01:02:34 AM by CryptorClub
content: Hello, Bitcointalk community. This topic created to make new wave to GREEN Token Announced 5+ years ago. This currency/token/project still exist and supported, but it not rocket boosted yet.Our proposal to make bounty reward for forums posting outside of bitcointalk.We are ready to reward in GREEN Tokens (classic ERC-20) and GrandpaGreen Tokens (Tax token with automatic rewards from future transactions). Tokens contract addresses on Polygon Network:GREEN: 0x8a4001fd666be272605c56bb956d11a46200db81GrandpaGreen: 0x68caf7335aa11188d9d91e1c9a5ab73a6de827beGREEN (ERC-20): 0x5e68801a5dda8671051006eb2920ffe9cd553544For 1 Forum post/article we propose: 5000 GREEN or 50000 GrandpaGreen TokensWide range of topics you can participate with wide range of topics.For example: How to create seo backlinks https://h0w.to/create/seo-backlinks/You may use your own article with topic that more related for you, just write to create custom page.Another example: What is bitcoin simply explained https://what1s.org/bitcoin/simply-explained/Also available youtube embed codes on any youtube videos, that you can share. (Ask for more info)All revenue (means monetization from advertising) we will got - returned into value of GREEN/GrandpaGreen Tokens, so each completed task is future value of traffic on these websites.---Reply with you questions/intentions.This post will be formatted with more UI, once it has been interested.Rules will be changed/formed on the way.
